climbs.name: Just Another Roadside Attraction
climbs.fa: Kevin Bein and Barb Devine, Spring 1980

content.description:
A hard short route for those looking into some "harder" trad lines in the Park.  

  Climb the steep, slightly overhanging finger/hand crack. As the crack ends clip an old bolt and climb slab to the summit.
content.location: This crack is located on the west side of the formation and faces the parking lot.

content.description: Roadside Attraction is a small spire right before the Needles Eye Parking Lot. Look for a small spire with a crack going up 3/4 of the way. A single bolt can seen from above the crack. Anchors with a white runner can be seen on top as of 09/13/12.
